page.title: 13Wivelsfield - Health
page.content: {St Francis Psychiatric Hospital}- has an occupational therapy unit and an industrial therapy unit to help teach new skills and crafts.There are bungalows where the patients learn to return to the outside community.The hospital has a Chapel holding multi-denominational services, it also has its own farm.There is a laundry with computerised washing machines and machines to fold and press the linen. { {Hurstwood Park Hospital -}is an important neurological centre, specialising in delicate brain and spine surgery. The hospital has a brain scanner feeding information to computers which store the information on floppy discs.
